channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The FOMO-fueled gold bubble may now be turning into a ‘mini-bust,’ analysts say
item.description: "The latest leg of the gold rally looks like a market bubble that is in its final stages."

item.title: Candy inflation has spooked so many consumers almost 80% say they’re forced to scale back how much to buy for Halloween
item.description: Of the 6,000+ shoppers surveyed, 83% said they’re capping their candy spending at $100.

item.title: Hurricane Melissa Is Category 5 With 175 MPH Winds — What’s Next?
item.description: Hurricane Melissa is a dangerous Category 5 hurricane with winds of 175 mph. What to expect as the storm approaches Jamaica.

item.title: Saudi investment chief warns: Global business needs cooperation, not protectionism
item.description: “In my view, no nation or company can achieve resilience [in] isolation,” said H.E. Khalid A. Al-Falih.

item.title: 12 Tips You Need To Know Before Playing ‘The Outer Worlds 2’
item.description: The Outer Worlds 2 is nearly here — and if you plan to start it soon, it pays to go in prepared, especially if you're not familiar with its quirks.

item.title: AIG to acquire the majority of renewal rights to Everest Group’s global retail insurance portfolio in $2 billion deal
item.description: The acquisition gives AIG access to future business without inheriting responsibility for claims and obligations predating the deal.

item.title: The Fed 5: Bessent's short list for Powell's job

item.title: Body Hackers: Pathologies In The AI Era
item.description: AI reveals how persistent pathogens hack human cells, driving aging and inspiring new diagnostic, anti-infection therapies.

item.title: Federal Reserve faces dilemma amid expected rate cut decision

item.title: Open-source AI is ‘China’s game right now’—and that’s a problem for the U.S. and its allies, Andreessen Horowitz partner says

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
